p: To extract the EOs, 60 g of each powdered sample was individually subjected to Clevenger apparatus (hydro-distillation method) for 3 h. The obtained EOs were dried over anhydrous sodium sulphate and stored in refrigerator at 4 °C until analysis. Yields of extracted EOs were calculated by Equation (1): EO% = (EOs weight)/(dried plants weight) × 100 (1)
